message.entry: The function dlresize requires that either 'Scale' or 'OutputSize' is specified.
{0} must be of the same length as the number of spatial dimensions in X.
When NaN specified in 'OutputSize' with N spatial dimensions, there must be exactly N-1 NaN entries.
The function dlresize requires a formatted dlarray input with at least one spatial dimension.
dlresize requires that scale is greater than or equal to 1 for spatial dimensions of size 1.
Code generation supports variable-size only for the spatial dimension of a dlarray input.
Code generation supports either all fixed-size or all variable-size spatial dimensions of a dlarray input with more than one spatial dimension.
Code generation does not support a dlarray input with more than 3 spatial dimensions.
